titles.title: Kyoufu Densetsu Kaiki! Frankenstein
恐怖伝説 怪奇! フランケンシュタイン
Frankensteins monster
Frankenstein

anime.description: In a foreboding castle, scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein performs a hideous experiment, which he hopes will bring the dead back to life. With the help of his assistant, he is successful in reanimating a man recreated from parts gathered from corpses, but the creature is unpredictable and horrifying. The doctor flees back to his home in Switzerland, leaving his assistant in charge of destroying the monster. But Dr. Frankenstein soon finds that he cannot hide from his shameful secret forever, as mysterious murders are committed around him, forcing him to question if his creation really is dead and gone.
